publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-960 Mr Ted Brocklebank: Support for Scottish Farmed Salmon Industry-That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Quality Salmon for the responsible manner in which it represented this vital Scottish industry during the recent food scare, following the publication of an American research paper that made highly misleading claims about Scottish farmed salmon and calls for all political parties to support publicly this important developing industry against any further dubious or commercially inspired attacks.

S2M-960 Mr Ted Brocklebank: Support for Scottish Farmed Salmon Industry-That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Quality Salmon for the responsible manner in which it represented this vital Scottish industry during the recent food scare, following the publication of an American research paper that made highly misleading claims about Scottish farmed salmon and calls for all political parties to support publicly this important developing industry against any further dubious or commercially inspired attacks.
S2M-960 Support for Scottish Farmed Salmon Industry (lodged on 26 February 2004) Phil Gallie*, Mr David Davidson*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-960 Support for Scottish Farmed Salmon Industry (lodged on 26 February 2004) Margaret Mitchell*, Richard Lochhead*, Murdo Fraser*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-960 Support for Scottish Farmed Salmon Industry (lodged on 26 February 2004) Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-960 Support for Scottish Farmed Salmon Industry (lodged on 26 February 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-960 Support for Scottish Farmed Salmon Industry (lodged on 26 February 2004) Helen Eadie*
